rows.label: tlk70000077_01_msg0001
rows.name:
Thanks for bringing me that rubbish
food before... Hey, I really mean it!

rows.label: tlk70000077_01_msg0002
rows.name:
Thanks to you, I managed to cure my
homesickness and cheer up. Now my
maintenance work is going great.

rows.label: tlk70000077_01_msg0003
rows.name:
Oh, yeah...
Talking of curing things, how are you
managing to heal up during fights?

rows.label: tlk70000077_01_msg0004
rows.name:
You've got to pay special attention that
you don't lose one of your team during
a battle.

rows.label: tlk70000077_01_msg0005
rows.name:
And it's much better if you keep an eye
on those team members who are taking
the most damage from enemies.

rows.label: tlk70000077_01_msg0006
rows.name:
If they go down, you might suddenly
find that your party suddenly falls to
pieces.

rows.label: tlk70000077_01_msg0007
rows.name:
You know, I gave some Superbian food
to a workmate. He was fine one
moment, then on the floor the next...

rows.label: tlk70000077_01_msg0008
rows.name:
We had some trouble filling our work
quota for that day, I can tell you!
Hahaha!
